title: Sailing the white sky
text: The Star Citizen sub-project called “Starmap” has been in the works for almost as long as the game itself. As in most games, players need a way to visualize the universe they’re in, and a lot of in-game options were explored.
contentCard: The Star Citizen sub-project called “Starmap” has been in the works for almost as long as the game itself. As in most games, players need a way to visualize the universe they’re in, and a lot of in-game options were explored.
